posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for t206 Chief Meyers portrait w/different backs
posts.post_content:

different backs as possible. Let me know if you have for sale or trade.

Cycle 460
Sweet Cap 350-460 fac 25
Sweet Cap 350-460 fac 42
Sweet Cap 350-460 fac 42 overprint
EPDG
Old Mill


[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
Thanks
Mike
